name: Icebreaker 2
summary: Pyramids. They're sneaky, evil, cunning, loathsome, and even pernicious (look it up!). And they thrive in some pretty nasty places - like lava, slime, ice and swamps. Your mission is simply to clear all 150 levels. We supply the plasma blaster. You supply the brains. Live or die, you'll rock while you try to destroy the four-faced menaces of Icebreaker 2.
